title: Interstate Gospel
lyrics:
Jesus is the bread of life, without him you're toast
Hallelujah y'all, I've found the holy ghost
To be almost saved only means that you're lost
Sins are expensive and Jesus paid the cost
These church signs, they light up these roads that I roam

They're leading me closer, they're calling me home

The further I get, the further I go

This interstate gospel is saving my soul

This interstate gospel is saving my soul



If you can't stand the heat, turn the prayer-conditioner up

Drink some holy water from a Dixie cup

If you're runnin' on empty, threw up on faith

Even ol' Moses was a basket case



These church signs, they light up these roads that I roam

They're leading me closer, they're calling me home

The further I get, the further I go

This interstate gospel is saving my soul

This interstate gospel is saving my soul



These church signs, they light up these roads that I roam

They're leading me closer, they're calling me home

The further I get, the further I go

This interstate gospel is saving my soul

This interstate gospel is saving my soul

This interstate gospel is saving my soul
